name: Epoch of Rest
description:
The scene: a greenhouse, heart of a small community in the boreal forest, decades after the Phase Change. The world is much kinder now, but the Winter Solstice Party has a small problem...

This emerged from wanting to finish a project in Bitsy - over a long weekend, but also during a pandemic, so it's very simple (one page). 

The low-stakes solarpunk action - such as it is - probably stems from circumstances as well.
